text: L.E. Desmarais et Cie, known in English as L.E. Desmarais & Company, was a photo studio active in Montreal, Quebec during the 19th century. The company was run by Louis-Élie and Ovila Desmarais. From 1864 to 1868, the company operated a studio at 277 rue Mignonne, at the corner of boulevard Saint Laurent. Photographs by the Desmarais' are included in the collection of the Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec. ==References== Category:Companies based in Montreal
title: Desmarais et Cie
